lead_paragraph: COHEN--Eleanor F.,77, devoted wife, mother, grandmother, sister and aunt passed away after a brave struggle with cancer. Ellie moved to New York from Denver, CO to attend Pratt and marry her first husband Dr. Gilbert Winn. (deceased 1997). She was a dedicated mother to her children Mitchell and Maxine Winn, Tracey and Robert Pruzan and doting grandmother to Amanda, Alison, Jason and Benjamin. A successful interior decorator for many years, she was also an avid golfer and a talented artist. In 2002 she married Donald Cohen and built a beautiful new life in East Hampton surrounded by friends where she enjoyed cooking, boating and her gardens. She is also lovingly remembered by Michael, Daphne, Rick and Linda, and by their children Daniel, Ethan, David and Allie. She will be dearly missed by her brothers Richard and Michael Fleischman of Denver, and by her large extended family there and in New York. Services will be on Sunday at noon at Gutterman's Funeral Home, Woodbury, NY. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  COHEN, ELEANOR F.
